hackathon-description-text: BCUHack is a 24 hour Hackathon, which is free for students at Birmingham City University. A Hackathon is an event in which a large number of people meet to engage in collaborative computer programming. Programmers and web developers of all experience levels are welcome to participate and you do not need to be an expert.

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: The winner will be chosen based on what we believe captures the hackathon spirit. Whether it's a web-app, game or middle-out compression algorithm, exploration and enthusiasm are key.
